prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of an obese, portly anthropomorphic feline deity, deep purple skin folds, large glowing yellow cat eyes, wearing heavy ancient egyptian jewelry, divine maroon silk robes, wide facial structure
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme detail on skin texture (sphynx cat like), realistic folds and wrinkles, detailed texture on maroon silk fabric, volumetric rim lighting, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic skin, smooth skin, human face, cat ears, flat lighting, low quality, deformed body, blurry silk
